articles.title: Top 10 nations holding the goldmine
articles.description: Rare earth elements are vital for technology and clean energy, with China dominating global reserves and production.
articles.content:
Rare earth elements (REEs), a group of 17 metals including 15 lanthanides, plus scandium and yttrium, are vital for modern technology, from smartphones and electric vehicles to wind turbines and military hardware.
While not truly rare, these metals a... [3512 chars]

articles.title: Almost 1 billion Salesforce records stolen, hacker group claims
articles.description: LONDON (Reuters) -Cybercriminals connected to a recent string of ransomware attacks on major British retailers said on Friday they had stolen almost 1 billion records from cloud technology giant Salesforce by focusing on companies that use its software.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) -Cybercriminals connected to a recent string of ransomware attacks on major British retailers said on Friday they had stolen almost 1 billion records from cloud technology giant Salesforce by focusing on companies that use its softwa... [1975 chars]

articles.title: India emerging as global destination for cost-effective quality healthcare: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Oct 3: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology; Earth Sciences and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Atomic Energy, Department of Space, Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions, Dr. Jitendra Singh, on Friday hailed the Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) Thiruvananthapuram for producing high-quality medical devices at affordable prices and called for scaling up production and expanding awareness of these indigenous innovations. The Minister said, India holds […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Oct 3: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology; Earth Sciences and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Atomic Energy, Department of Space, Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensio... [3129 chars]

articles.title: Tetra Pak Showcases World-class, Made-in-India Solutions at Indian Ice Cream Expo 2025
articles.description: NEW DELHI, Oct 3: Tetra Pak, world’s leading food processing and packaging solutions company, is showcasing a portfolio of innovative and Made-in-India solutions at the Indian Ice Cream Expo (IICE) 2025 in Delhi. With a strong focus on making premium technology more accessible, Tetra Pak aims to empower local ice cream businesses to innovate, scale, and deliver high-quality products that resonate with evolving consumer tastes. A key highlight is Tetra Pak’s Made in India portfolio of ice cream solutions. By […]
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Oct 3: Tetra Pak, world’s leading food processing and packaging solutions company, is showcasing a portfolio of innovative and Made-in-India solutions at the Indian Ice Cream Expo (IICE) 2025 in Delhi. With a strong focus on making premium... [3823 chars]

articles.title: IUST signs MoU with University of Philippines
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent AWANTIPORA, Oct 3: The Islamic University of Science and Technology (IUST) today signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the University of the Philippines Diliman (UPD), the national university of the Philippines, to promote academic cooperation and encourage mutual understanding between the two institutions. The MoU was signed by Prof A H Moon, Dean Academic Affairs, IUST, and Edgardo Carlo L Vistan II, Chancellor, UPD in presence of the Vice-Chancellor, IUST, Prof Shakil Ahmad Romshoo. The MoU outlines […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
AWANTIPORA, Oct 3: The Islamic University of Science and Technology (IUST) today signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the University of the Philippines Diliman (UPD), the national university of the Philippines, to p... [867 chars]

articles.title: India set to become global chip powerhouse: Gaurav
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Oct 3: BJP spokesperson for J&K UT, Gaurav Gupta, said that the global recognition of Prime Minister, Narendra Modi’s visionary leadership by Advanced Semiconductor Materials Lithography (ASML), the world’s leading Dutch semiconductor giant, has once again reaffirmed India’s rise as a global technology powerhouse. Speaking at the Politico Competitive Europe Summit in Brussels, Frank Heemskerk, Executive Vice President of Global Public Affairs at ASML, openly criticized European Union leaders for being inaccessible to businesses and contrasted this […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Oct 3: BJP spokesperson for J&K UT, Gaurav Gupta, said that the global recognition of Prime Minister, Narendra Modi’s visionary leadership by Advanced Semiconductor Materials Lithography (ASML), the world’s leading Dutc... [2052 chars]

articles.title: Defense attorneys in grad student killing pause fight against facial recognition technology
articles.description: A trial is expected early next year in the case, which has dragged on for more than four years.
articles.content:
Public defenders for a man accused of the unprovoked stabbing death of a visiting graduate student in downtown Chicago in 2021 paused their fight over facial recognition technology, after new evidence showed it was a moot issue Friday.
Attorneys for ... [2954 chars]

articles.title: The Real Edge in AI Marketing is Human Thinking
articles.description: After the initial hype, companies are realizing that access to technology doesn’t automatically translate into differentiation.
articles.content: AI is everywhere. Boards are asking for AI roadmaps. Marketers are testing prompts, automating campaigns, and generating content at scale. The tools are dazzling. The promises are intoxicating. But amid all the excitement, one thing is becoming painf... [5083 chars]
